rules1: Up to 2 times: Swap an Equipped card with your Revision.
rules2: Draw 2 cards. Return 2 cards.

rules1: Up to 2 times: Swap an Equipped card with your Revision.
rules2: Draw 2 cards: Equip one, Discard the other. Return an Equipped card.

rules1: Up to 2 times: Swap an Equipped card with your Revision.
rules2: You and a player each pick one of your cards. Trade the chosen cards.

rules1: Draw 2 cards. Return 2 cards.
rules2: Draw 2 cards: Equip one, Discard the other. Return an Equipped card.

rules1: Draw 2 cards. Return 2 cards.
rules2: You and a player each pick one of your cards. Trade the chosen cards.

rules1: Draw 2 cards: Equip one, Discard the other. Return an Equipped card.
rules2: You and a player each pick one of your cards. Trade the chosen cards.

rules1: Rotate one or two of your Equipment cards.
rules2: Draw a card. Discard a card.

rules1: Rotate one or two of your Equipment cards.
rules2: Look at the top 2 cards of the deck. Return or Discard them.

rules1: Rotate one or two of your Equipment cards.
rules2: Use an Item facing away from you. Its owner Returns and then draws a card.

rules1: Draw a card. Discard a card.
rules2: Look at the top 2 cards of the deck. Return or Discard them.

rules1: Draw a card. Discard a card.
rules2: Use an Item facing away from you. Its owner Returns and then draws a card.

rules1: Look at the top 2 cards of the deck. Return or Discard them.
rules2: Use an Item facing away from you. Its owner Returns and then draws a card.

rules1: Draw a card. Equip a card and activate it. Return an Equipped card.
rules2: Discard 2 cards. Draw 2 cards.

rules1: Draw a card. Equip a card and activate it. Return an Equipped card.
rules2: Rotate one of another player's cards.

rules1: Draw a card. Equip a card and activate it. Return an Equipped card.
rules2: Look at the top 4 cards of the deck, Return them in any order.

rules1: Discard 2 cards. Draw 2 cards.
rules2: Rotate one of another player's cards.

rules1: Discard 2 cards. Draw 2 cards.
rules2: Look at the top 4 cards of the deck, Return them in any order.

rules1: Rotate one of another player's cards.
rules2: Look at the top 4 cards of the deck, Return them in any order.

name: x0.1
rules1: Swap this card with the Paradox. Rotate a card that you own.
rules2: Look at 3 cards from the deck, Draw 1, Discard the rest, then Return 1 card.

name: x0.2
rules1: Swap this card with the Paradox. Rotate a card that you own.
rules2: Score your revision for 1 point.

name: x0.3
rules1: Swap this card with the Paradox. Rotate a card that you own.
rules2: Take a card from a player. That player takes a card from you.

name: x0.4
rules1: Look at 3 cards from the deck, Draw 1, Discard the rest, then Return 1 card.
rules2: Score your revision for 1 point.

name: x0.5
rules1: Look at 3 cards from the deck, Draw 1, Discard the rest, then Return 1 card.
rules2: Take a card from a player. That player takes a card from you.

name: x0.6
rules1: Score your revision for 1 point.
rules2: Take a card from a player. That player takes a card from you.

name: x1.1
rules1: Swap the top card of the deck with the Paradox. Rotate an Equipment.
rules2: For each card in your Equipment: either Discard it and Draw a card, or Rotate it.

name: x1.2
rules1: Swap the top card of the deck with the Paradox. Rotate an Equipment.
rules2: Return this card. its owner Draws 1 card. Swap a card with a player's Revision.

name: x1.3
rules1: Swap the top card of the deck with the Paradox. Rotate an Equipment.
rules2: Use an Item facing you. Return and then Draw a card.

name: x1.4
rules1: For each card in your Equipment: either Discard it and Draw a card, or Rotate it.
rules2: Return this card. its owner Draws 1 card. Swap a card with a player's Revision.

name: x1.5
rules1: For each card in your Equipment: either Discard it and Draw a card, or Rotate it.
rules2: Use an Item facing you. Return and then Draw a card.

name: x1.6
rules1: Return this card. its owner Draws 1 card. Swap a card with a player's Revision.
rules2: Use an Item facing you. Return and then Draw a card.

name: x2.1
rules1: Discard an Equipped card. Equip a card and activate it. Draw a card.
rules2: Rotate all Equipment. Discard a card. Draw a card.

name: x2.2
rules1: Discard an Equipped card. Equip a card and activate it. Draw a card.
rules2: Score the Paradox for 2. All other players Draw a card then Discard a card.

name: x2.3
rules1: Discard an Equipped card. Equip a card and activate it. Draw a card.
rules2: Look at the entire deck. Return it in the same order.

name: x2.4
rules1: Rotate all Equipment. Discard a card. Draw a card.
rules2: Score the Paradox for 2. All other players Draw a card then Discard a card.

name: x2.5
rules1: Rotate all Equipment. Discard a card. Draw a card.
rules2: Look at the entire deck. Return it in the same order.

name: x2.6
rules1: Score the Paradox for 2. All other players Draw a card then Discard a card.
rules2: Look at the entire deck. Return it in the same order.
